Title: GUID Generator
Description: GUID Generator is a small utility for generating GUIDs (Globally Unique Identifiers).  It's developed using C# and .NET 4 Client Profile.  There is also a Silverlight 4 version as well.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
GUID Generator is a small utility for generating GUIDs (Globally Unique Identifiers). It's developed using C# and .NET 4 Client Profile. There is also a Silverlight 4 version as well.



The WPF version runs in the system tray, can start automatically with Windows, and responds to system-wide hotkeys:
  • +G generates a new GUID and copies it to the clipboard.
  • +H generates multiple GUIDs (after prompting for a count) and copies them to the clipboard.

Both versions provide five different formats, provided by the Guid.ToString method, and both upper and lower case.
